Node API¶

<<<<<<< HEAD Each Aurora node has an http server running in the background. This ======= Each Aurora node has a http server running in the background. This >>>>>>> f9ecdf2b6ede3c986315ebed6208ed1e85d1770c server is responsible for communication with other nodes and executing commands in its own node. The server provides the following functionalities.

home() /

Settings page(not implemented yet)

on_api_name() /api/name

Request requires no parameters

Returns name of node in plaintext

on_api_docommand /api/docommand

Runs given command in requested node

Parameters

cmd – command to run

Returns

200 - Command ran succesfully

Returns

400 - Missing parameter

Returns

403 - Command not allowed (see allowed commands)

on_api_sendcommand() /api/sendcommand

Sends request for another node to /api/docommand

Parameters

  • cmd – command to be sent

  • target – name of target node

Returns

200 - When command was sent succesfully, and other node replied with code 200 to docommand request

Returns

400 - Some paramerers are missing or target is not in known_nodes of sender (see known_nodes)

Returns

other code - If command was sent succesfully, but docommand request failed. This fail status code is returned

on_api_nodes() /api/nodes

Returns list of known nodes in json (see known nodes)

No parameters are required

Returns

200 - Returns list of known nodes as json string

on_api_connect() /api/connect

Connects current node to network requested node is in. Adds new node to every other node’s known_nodes list using /api/addnode.

Parameters

  • port – Port number sender node is listening on

  • name – name of sender node

Returns

200 - Node connected succesfully

Returns

400 - Missing parameter

on_api_addnode() /api/addnode

Adds new node to known_nodes list. This method should be available only for trusted nodes. (Authentication not implemented yet)

Parameters

  • ip – IPv4 address of new node

  • port – port number of new node

  • name – name of new node

Returns

200 - When succesfully added new node

Returns

400 - Missing parameter
